Package de.jvstvshd.localstream.network.handling

Interface PacketServerHandler

All Superinterfaces:
PacketHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
PacketHandler.BasicImpl
public interface PacketServerHandler extends PacketHandler
Packet handler whose implementations are found in the client. All operations should be done in the client.
